brand.subtitle: Quick activity: ‚ÄúWho do I report to?‚Äù
brand.title: Who‚Äôs who in prevention ‚Äî a quick game to learn preventive roles
check.body.red: Some basic controls are missing before starting.
diagram.css.p: Interferences between contractors and coordination of activities on site.
diagram.decision.h: 2) Is it serious / is there an injury?
diagram.decision.p: If there‚Äôs an injury or an imminent serious risk, prioritize emergency response.
diagram.delegado.p: Participation channel and proposals. Does not replace urgent reporting to the supervisor.
diagram.emergency.p: Secure the area, ask for help, then inform through internal channels.
diagram.mando.p: Foreman / team lead / site manager. Primary channel when available.
diagram.recurso.p: Fast route on site if the supervisor isn‚Äôt reachable or for minor/repeated issues. Leaves preventive record.
diagram.tecnico.p: Prevention processes: procedures, training, PPE, substances, technical consults.
diagram.title: Escalation diagram (who to notify)
diagram.worker.p: Detects the risk/incident and reports it.
fb.body.amber:

‚úÖ Best option: {GREEN}
fb.body.red:
üî¥ Not the safest option.

fb.timeoutWhy: Don‚Äôt wait for 100% certainty: if there‚Äôs exposure, prioritize stopping/isolating and reporting.
help.check: Express checklist: pick the 3 must-haves before starting. (8 rounds)
help.myth: Trick phrase: myth / truth / depends. (10 rounds)
help.order: Order the actions: 3 rounds. Arrange from first to last (immediate control ‚Üí notify ‚Üí fix).
help.quiz: Quick questions: choose who to notify and why. (10 rounds)
help.say: What do I tell the supervisor?: choose the most actionable report (location + risk + temporary control). (10 rounds)
help.sema: Traffic light (5s): decide the first action (stop / isolate / notify). If in doubt: stop and notify.
help.tf: True/False: 10 quick statements. Scoring: correct = 2 ¬∑ wrong = 0.
lang.body: Select your language to enter the room.
lang.title: Choose your language
mode.say: What do I tell the supervisor?
mp.endedHint: The host closed the room or the connection was lost.
mp.joinTip: Tip: if you join from a QR code, the code fills in automatically.
mp.noAnswerBody: ‚è≥ You didn‚Äôt answer. The correct one was {L}.
mp.revealBody: Check with the supervisor/preventive resource what control you apply and how you communicate it.
mp.sentBody: The question was sent to the room.
mp.waitHint: When the game starts, the questions will appear here.
mp.waitSubtitle: Waiting for the host to start the game‚Ä¶
mp.wrongBody: ‚ùå Not that one. The correct one was {L}.
opt.mode.say: What do I tell the supervisor?
plan.title: Your action plan
result.detail: Mode: {MODE} ¬∑ Green = 2 ¬∑ Amber = 1 ¬∑ Red = 0 ¬∑ Total rounds: {ROUNDS}
room.note: Create the room, let people join, then press ‚ÄúStart‚Äù again to launch the game.
sw.body: Use this if there is a serious and imminent risk, missing/failing collective protection, or dangerous interferences. First secure the area; then communicate.
sw.default.control: I stopped the task and marked/isolated the area.
sw.default.need: Supervisor/preventive resource to come, fix it, and leave a record.
sw.msgReady: Message ready to send (supervisor / preventive resource / CSS):
sw.ph.control: e.g., I stopped the task and marked/isolated
sw.ph.loc: e.g., Floor 2, north wing, next to stair opening
sw.ph.need: e.g., supervisor/preventive resource to come, fix it, and leave a record
sw.ph.risk: e.g., opening without guardrail / loose cables / lifting without barricades
sw.title: STOP WORK ¬∑ Safe stop
